channel.title: Client ip change! [639] Help Is GREATLY APPRECIATED!
channel.description: [size=14pt]Help! im running demented 639 and the client is eclipse 639 client! I can join my own server and my friend cant... where do i change the ip on his client folder? Please answer ASAP! btw i made an no-ip its working all green checks and i checked the port with that site and it says its success. what the hell am i doing wrong? [b]I Know that my client has to say 127.0.0.1 and the public one has to say my no-ip.[/b] and i edited the run.bat to put my no-ip there for his. why isnt this working still? i tried everything![/size]

item.title: Client ip change! [639] Help Is GREATLY APPRECIATED!
item.dc:creator: @BritniSlone BritniSlone
item.description:
@BritniSlone wrote:

Okay all that has worked i think this is what its says. can i use utorrent to port forward? btw thank you for the help it means alot.

258rq5c.gif1024×768

item.source: Client ip change! [639] Help Is GREATLY APPRECIATED!

item.title: Client ip change! [639] Help Is GREATLY APPRECIATED!
item.dc:creator: @Legionscape669 Legionscape669
item.description:
@Legionscape669 wrote:

Normal 639 there is a clientsettings.java or client.java file in both server and client folder’s edit both 127.0.0.1 ips to ur no-ip one then download the DUC 3.0 file from http://www.no-ip.com there program and click “select hosts” and tick ur no-ip one also you have to (if your a windows 7 person read more!) open ur firewall, start > search - firewall > open “windows firewall, with advance settings” then click new rule and use tcp and for port 43594 and access from everywere and put it online, thats to portforward… and name the rule “yourservername.no-ip.yourno-ip.ending” (normaly .biz). and then go to www.canyouseeme.org and type 43594 and click search and if it sais success then update the client give him link (you could of just made a webclient…)

Read full topic

btw i made an no-ip its working all green checks and i checked the port with that site and it says its success. what the hell am i doing wrong? I Know that my client has to say 127.0.0.1 and the public one has to say my no-ip. and i edited the run.bat to put my no-ip there for his. why isnt this working still? i tried everything![/size][/quote]

You might as well stick to delta or any 317’s, I’m pretty sure your question has an easy solution. Besides you won’t know how to code it if you can’t even solve this.
